Name: Newport Corp
Description: DELISTED - Newport Corporation is a supplier of advanced technology products and systems to a range of industries, including scientific research, microelectronics, aerospace and defence/security, life and health sciences, and industrial markets. The Company provides a portfolio of products to customers in these end markets for photonics solutions. The Company operates in three segments: The Photonics and Precision Technologies (PPT) Division, The Lasers Division and The Ophir Division. All of its divisions offer an array of advanced technology products and services to original equipment manufacturer (OEM) and customers across a range of applications in all of its targeted end markets. In January 2012, the Company acquired ILX Lightwave Corporation (ILX). On December 29, 2011, it acquired substantially all of the assets of Opticoat SRL (Opticoat). In October 2011, it acquired Ophir Optronics Ltd. (Ophir). In July 2011, it acquired High Q Technologies GmbH (High Q).
